solver.explanations.strategies

Class DecisionsSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.search.strategy.decision.Decision<IntVar>
      • solver.explanations.strategies.DecisionsSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Decision<IntVar>>, ICause, Identity

    public class DecisionsSet
extends Decision<IntVar>
implements Serializable
    A specific type of decision which stores a set of decisions to apply. This class is dedicated to explanation framework and is used for path reparation. Decisions to apply "as is" and the one that should be refute, are stored, and the tree search is re-build on a call to DecisionsSet.apply().
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
